00035         // radians
00036         template <typename genType>
00037         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType radians
00038         (
00039                 genType const & degrees
00040         )
00041         {
00042                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'radians' only accept floating-point input");
00043 
00044                 return degrees * genType(0.01745329251994329576923690768489);
00045         }
00046 
00047         VECTORIZE_VEC(radians)
00048         
00049         // degrees
00050         template <typename genType>
00051         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType degrees
00052         (
00053                 genType const & radians
00054         )
00055         {
00056                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'degrees' only accept floating-point input");
00057 
00058                 return radians * genType(57.295779513082320876798154814105);
00059         }
00060 
00061         VECTORIZE_VEC(degrees)

00065         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType sin
00066         (
00067                 genType const & angle
00068         )
00069         {
00070                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'sin' only accept floating-point input");
00071 
00072                 return genType(::std::sin(angle));
00073         }
00074

00137         {
00138                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'atan' only accept floating-point input");

00191         )
00192         {

00200         // asinh
00201         template <typename genType> 
00202         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType asinh
00203         (
00204                 genType const & x
00205         )
00206         {
00207                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'asinh' only accept floating-point input");
00208                 
00209                 return (x < genType(0) ? genType(-1) : (x > genType(0) ? genType(1) : genType(0))) * log(abs(x) + sqrt(genType(1) + x * x));
00210         }
00211 
00212         VECTORIZE_VEC(asinh)
00213 
00214         // acosh
00215         template <typename genType> 
00216         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType acosh
00217         (
00218                 genType const & x
00219         )
00220         {
00221                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'acosh' only accept floating-point input");
00222 
00223                 if(x < genType(1))
00224                         return genType(0);
00225                 return log(x + sqrt(x * x - genType(1)));
00226         }
00227 
00228         VECTORIZE_VEC(acosh)
00229 
00230         // atanh
00231         template <typename genType>
00232         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType atanh
00233         (
00234                 genType const & x
00235         )
00236         {
00237                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559, "'atanh' only accept floating-point input");
00238                 
00239                 if(abs(x) >= genType(1))
00240                         return 0;
00241                 return genType(0.5) * log((genType(1) + x) / (genType(1) - x));
00242         }
00243 
00244         VECTORIZE_VEC(atanh)
00245
